attributes.action: Scrap coursework for all GCSE students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some may argue that coursework disciplines students into meeting deadlines and that they can boost their grades by doing a good piece of coursework in their subjects. The reality: stressed children, stressed parents and stressed teachers.
Coursework has many more cons than pros, so sign below to scrap coursework, to scrap stress and to ease the hardship that is school life.
